comment: The police do not own tanks. They own armored trucks. Although they have no need for them either but that isn't a tank.
amr:
# ::snt The police do not own tanks. They own armored trucks. Although they have no need for them either but that isn't a tank.
(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (o / own-01
            :polarity -
            :ARG0 (p / police)
            :ARG1 (t / tank))
      :snt2 (o2 / own-01
            :ARG0 p
            :ARG1 (t2 / truck
                  :ARG1-of (a / armor-01)))
      :snt3 (h / have-concession-91
            :ARG1 (t3 / tank
                  :polarity -
                  :domain (t4 / that))
            :ARG2 (n / need-01
                  :polarity -
                  :ARG0 p
                  :ARG1 t2
                  :mod (e / either))))
